scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix agentnet-backend" "npm run dev --prefix agentnet-frontend"
scripts.build:unified: npm run build --prefix agentnet-frontend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.copy:frontend: rm -rf agentnet-backend/public && mkdir -p agentnet-backend/public && cp -r agentnet-frontend/dist/* agentnet-backend/public/
scripts.start:split: concurrently "npm run start --prefix agentnet-backend" "npm run serve --prefix agentnet-frontend"
scripts.start:unified: npm run build:unified && npm run start --prefix agentnet-backend
